note.name: Dogs are better than cats 03
note.text: Dogs respond when you call their name (unlike cats, who just ignore you)

note.name: WikipediaLink
note.text: Error querying Wikipedia: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='en.wikipedia.org', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /w/api.php?action=opensearch&search=network&limit=1&namespace=0&format=json (Caused by NameResolutionError("<urllib3.connection.HTTPSConnection object at 0x000001C7B137F390>: Failed to resolve 'en.wikipedia.org' ([Errno 11001] getaddrinfo failed)"))
